title: get matched against worst riven oce, you wont believe what happens next
body:
Go 15/1 on her trash ass, super salt 5000.

Get her as my top laner next game, tell her "its k man im down here from b1 atm, climbing back to where im meant to be"

doesnotcompute.jpg

%%%% int feeds till shes 0/10 to spite us.

notbanned.exe

replies.body: Did you report? Many people forgot to actually report the jackass players after an infuriating match, which is understandable but still.

i always report but reports dont work.

case in point there is a pair of trolls who ill name here, because even the 5 minutes before it gets removed is enough to warn players about them.

sovietstalin, and toxicmemelord.

These two players, are known trolls, active trolls, that have been trolling for well over a year now.

How do i know that? oh simple, im one of their favourite fucking players to tilt, they recognise me by name, they go out of their way to either carry the team if they are on the other team, or build nothing but culls and run it down mid if they are on mine.

And they arent just trolls, theyre smurfs too, in low elo bronze.

Yet riot does fucking nothing.

ive shot maybe god i play a thousand games a season easily, i have them maybe every 20 or so games.

So a few hundreds reports, give or take.

So why the fuck arent they banned if the report system is so flawless, like if it cant even catch a pair of accounts literally made for the sole purpose of trolling low elo players, how the fuck can we expect it to work for literally anything else.
Its like I'm almost as famous as you are on the forums.{{champion:20}}
OMG ITS THE SECOND BEST NUNU OCE {{champion:20}}
Thanks for the shoutout man, no need to tell people i'm so bad that my usual gameplay is trolling though :(
I remember reading somewhere that if you spam reports they carry less weight. Could be wrong but could also be right.

i had a person like that on my team.

they had the counter pick and im like DONT PLAY AN AD CHAMP INTO MALPHITE .... they picked irelia. needless to say malphite got fed asf and carried the rest of the game.

next game i get into load screen, is the same person only on a different team and our guy has the favourable matchup this time.

our guy is even shitter, the feeder from last game gets fed asf and is unkillable. 

it was one of those fuck this game moments

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sLOEqY5A,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-29T13:45:59.875+0000)
>
> i had a person like that on my team.
> 
> they had the counter pick and im like DONT PLAY AN AD CHAMP INTO MALPHITE .... they picked irelia. needless to say malphite got fed asf and carried the rest of the game.
> 
> next game i get into load screen, is the same person only on a different team and our guy has the favourable matchup this time.
> 
> our guy is even shitter, the feeder from last game gets fed asf and is unkillable. 
> 
> it was one of those fuck this game moments

Seems like that guy just had a bad game when teamed with you!
If you're good at the game, you'll climb.

sure if i play a 1000+ games maybe

Atm because i win 17lp, lose 20lp, and get a shitty team about 50% of the time, im having to put in extra effort just to maintain my rank let alone climb.
